snippet.title: Cry of Fear - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Cry of Fear will now be re-released on Steam as a Stand Alone game. More info here: http://www.cry-of-fear.com/

This trailer is an edited version of the MOTY 2012 trailer.

Song: Andreas Rönnberg - Ghost
Link: http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/andreasronnberg2
